languages.text: Every time the Pet's ability is used on the Overseer or an ally, for 1 round they receive +5 to stats considered key stats for this Pet.

traits.locale_text: Every time the Pet's ability is used on the Overseer or an ally, for 1 round they receive +5 to stats considered key stats for this Pet.

languages.text: Whenever a familiar's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used on an ally (can be the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}), for 1 round, that ally gains a +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} considered to be key characteristics of the familiar.

languages.text: Richtet sich die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Vertrauten auf einen Verbündeten (bzw. den {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g}), erhält dieser Verbündete 1 Runde lang einen Bonus von +5 auf Eigenschaften, die als wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} des Vertrauten betrachtet werden.
languages.original_text: Whenever a familiar's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used on an ally (can be the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}), for 1 round, that ally gains a +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} considered to be key characteristics of the familiar.

traits.locale_text: Richtet sich die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Vertrauten auf einen Verbündeten (bzw. den {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g}), erhält dieser Verbündete 1 Runde lang einen Bonus von +5 auf Eigenschaften, die als wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} des Vertrauten betrachtet werden.

languages.text: Chaque fois que la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'un familier est utilisée sur un allié (y compris le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}), pendant 1 round, celui-ci gagne un bonus de +5 aux {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} considérées comme des caractéristiques clés du familier.
languages.original_text: Whenever a familiar's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used on an ally (can be the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}), for 1 round, that ally gains a +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} considered to be key characteristics of the familiar.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'un familier est utilisée sur un allié (y compris le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}), pendant 1 round, celui-ci gagne un bonus de +5 aux {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} considérées comme des caractéristiques clés du familier.

Chaque fois que la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'un familier est utilisée sur un allié (y compris le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}), celui-ci gagne un bonus de +5 aux caractéristiques considérées comme des {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} clés du familier.

languages.text: 每当使仆对盟友（包括{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}在内）使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，根据使仆的关键属性，该名盟友的相应{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}也会提高5点，持续一轮。
languages.original_text: Whenever a familiar's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used on an ally (can be the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}), for 1 round, that ally gains a +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} considered to be key characteristics of the familiar.

traits.locale_text: 每当使仆对盟友（包括{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}在内）使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，根据使仆的关键属性，该名盟友的相应{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}也会提高5点，持续一轮。

languages.text: Cuando se usa una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de familiar sobre un aliado (puede ser el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}), el aliado obtiene una bonificación +5 a las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} que se consideran clave para el familiar durante 1 asalto.
languages.original_text: Whenever a familiar's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used on an ally (can be the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}), for 1 round, that ally gains a +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} considered to be key characteristics of the familiar.

traits.locale_text: Cuando se usa una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de familiar sobre un aliado (puede ser el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}), el aliado obtiene una bonificación +5 a las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} que se consideran clave para el familiar durante 1 asalto.

languages.text: ファミリアーの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が味方（{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の場合も）に使用される場合、その味方は1ラウンドの間に主要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}とみなされる特性に+5のボーナスが付与される。
languages.original_text: Whenever a familiar's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used on an ally (can be the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}), for 1 round, that ally gains a +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} considered to be key characteristics of the familiar.

traits.locale_text: ファミリアーのアビリティが味方（監督官の場合も）に使用される場合、その味方は主要な特性とみなされる特性に+5のボーナスが付与される。
ファミリアーの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が味方（{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の場合も）に使用される場合、その味方は主要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}とみなされる特性に+5のボーナスが付与される。

languages.text: Bir iyenin {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} bir dost birimin ({g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} de olabilir) üzerinde kullanıldığında o dost birim, iyenin kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri{/g} sayılan niteliklerine +5 bonus kazanır. Bu etki 1 raunt sürer.
languages.original_text: Whenever a familiar's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used on an ally (can be the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}), for 1 round, that ally gains a +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} considered to be key characteristics of the familiar.

traits.locale_text: Bir iyenin {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} bir dost birimin ({g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} de olabilir) üzerinde kullanıldığında o dost birim, iyenin kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri{/g} sayılan niteliklerine +5 bonus kazanır. Bu etki 1 raunt sürer.
